scripts.dev: pnpm exec concurrently "pnpm --filter @swarmroom/server run dev" "pnpm --filter @swarmroom/web run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @swarmroom/shared run build && pnpm --filter @swarmroom/web run build && pnpm --filter @swarmroom/server run build && pnpm --filter @swarmroom/sdk run build && pnpm --filter swarmroom run build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter @swarmroom/server run test && pnpm --filter @swarmroom/web run test && pnpm --filter swarmroom run test
scripts.publish:all: pnpm run build && pnpm --filter @swarmroom/shared publish --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter @swarmroom/server publish --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter @swarmroom/sdk publish --no-git-checks && pnpm --filter swarmroom publish --no-git-checks
